com.yantra.ycm.japi.ue

Interface YCMGetItemDetailsUE


  • public interface YCMGetItemDetailsUE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getItemDetails(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The YCMGetItemDetailsUE user exit interface contains user exit method for getItemDetails API.

    • Method Detail

      • getItemDetails

        org.w3c.dom.Document getItemDetails(YFSEnvironment env,
                                    org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                             throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        The YCMGetItemDetailsUE user exit interface contains user exit method for getItemDetails API. It provides you with an option of externalizing the logic to get details about an Item.

        This user exit may return a <ExtnDataElement> element under the Item element. This element, including any attributes set and any child elements, will appear in the output of item-related APIs if the ExtnDataElement element is present in the output template. These APIs include getItemDetails, getItemList, getItemListForOrdering, and other item-related APIs.

        To code custom user exits, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the methods in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back.


        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD

        Pre-conditions: This user exit is called when the searching item does not exist in the system.

        Post-conditions: The output XML containing details about an item that matches input criteria.


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API. This is required for the user exit to raise errors and access environment information.
        inXML - Required, containing either ItemKey or Item Id/Unit of Measure/Product Class/Organization Code as attributes. For more information, see the associated input xml files.


        Returns:
        An XML document containing Item details. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
